activities:
Customer data is received for sales and marketing of projectors, accessories and service.  The information is collected so that InFocus can compete a transaction, communicate back to the customer, update the customer on service, benefits and support, and to receive marketing information.  Customers also request information and register their purchase products.
InFocus will also collect and transfer employee data for the purposes of employee benefits and services.  Benefits and services include performance evaluations, administration and workforce management, security management, company network access, directory, authentication and personalization, administration of compensation, provision of employment benefits, and reporting.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Human Resources, Manually Processed
